function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Allowance of outdoor activities with warnings to keep distance and avoid gatherings leading to prolonged restrictions and increased monitoring.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to integrate sustainability into covid-19 risk reduction measures","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowding in lifts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of the role of architecture and urban planning in sustaining diverse cultures and lifestyles in the context of contagious diseases","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Circulation of fake news","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Compounding environmental injustices due to covid-19 impact on vulnerable populations","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of rumors and conspiracy theories online","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hospital design and adaptability to emerging problems may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smart buildings and robots must grasp spatial indoor topology, semantics, and dynamic information to serve people effectively","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rising prevalence and severity of pollinosis","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Poor correlation of one item in relation to the others may affect the overall accuracy of the findings.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Wildlife disturbance","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"More information about covid-19 can lead to increased anxiety and worry.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fallout in working hours due to pandemic impact","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for close-to-real-time data on loneliness-related sentiments","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unidentified health and safety protocols during interactions with interviewees from various companies and organizations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability to directly interact and view data in federated systems","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integration of high resolution risk mapping with cdrs","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited use of vaccines for diseases like dengue due to safety concerns may hinder effective disease control and prevention.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse psychological outcomes associated with home confinement and social distancing during the pandemic, including emotional disorders, depression, anxiety, stress, irritability, insomnia, ptsd, anger, emotional exhaustion, risky behaviors, and increased substance abuse.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of enforcement of mask-wearing may lead to increased transmission of contagious diseases within the facility.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglecting local community adaptations in epidemic contexts","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of ai in predicting patient outcomes and disease diagnosis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Traveling and non-necessary social contacts advised against by health directive.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for disease transmission in high-traffic areas like hallways and atria due to close proximity and frequent contact between individuals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Assumption of homogeneous mixing of people within each region","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Positive coefficients for most cities across the country and statistically significant at the 0.01 level, except for the northwestern cities.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent findings in the impact of green buildings on occupants’ health","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Features facilitating rapid conversion of large public venues","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of economic instability and disparity in neighborhoods due to post-pandemic contractions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disregard for the risk to vulnerable populations when not following guidelines","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close contact with individuals suffering from acute respiratory infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective contact tracing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate data protection and privacy measures in the utilization of big data and iot for health services may lead to confidentiality breaches and misuse of personal information","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misleading content","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Institutional quarantining overwhelmed system leading to more infections","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High number of infected people in the building","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strain on the economic system","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact on working performance","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper ppe removal leading to recontamination of clothes and hands","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption in supply chain","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for further investigation into the definition and significance of indoor greenery for human health and well-being","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in responses to pandemic based on theoretical constructs","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in office buildings due to close proximity of occupants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in domestic and medical waste","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community participation in control policies and preventative measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Link between park use patterns and park access/proximity","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on environmental protection and social issues","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate cyber security measures and privacy concerns related to the use and storage of sensitive information on cloud accounts.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of different computing technologies in future cities","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"}]}
